name: polar-google-cloud-storage-like
description: APIs that are similar across the Google Cloud Storage backend and frontend APIs.

scripts.compile: RESULT="$(find . -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -name '*.d.ts*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'Nothing to Compile'; else yarn run tsc; fi;
scripts.watch: RESULT="$(find . -name '*.ts' -o -name '*.tsx' -not -path './node_modules/*' -not -name '*.d.ts*')" && if [ -z "$RESULT" ]; then echo 'Nothing to Compile'; else yarn run tscwatch; fi;

author: Polar
